Question
========

The SS-within in a one-way ANOVA and the SS-residual in a bivariate regression analysis both represent:
  
Answerlist
----------
* Variance in Y not explained by X. 
* Variance in Y explained by X.
* Total variance in Y.
* Explained variance in Y as a proportion of total variance in Y.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
